mapper.select: SELECT center_return_code, animal_type, t.staff_name, center_return_date, center_return_name, center_return_age, center_return_address, center_return_phone FROM tb_center_return AS c INNER JOIN tb_staff AS t ON c.staff_code=t.staff_code;

SELECT center_return_code, animal_type, staff_code, center_return_date, center_return_name, center_return_age, center_return_address, center_return_phone FROM tb_center_return WHERE center_return_code=#{centerReturnCode};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT('CAC_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(center_return_code,5) AS DECIMAL)+1)) AS center_return_code FROM tb_center_return;
INSERT INTO tb_center_return (center_return_code, animal_type, staff_code, center_return_date, center_return_name, center_return_age, center_return_address, center_return_phone) VALUES ( #{centerReturnCode}, #{animalType}, #{staff.staffCode}, NOW(), #{centerReturnName}, #{centerReturnAge}, #{centerReturnAddress}, #{centerReturnPhone} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_center_return SET animal_type=#{animalType}, center_return_name=#{centerReturnName}, center_return_age=#{centerReturnAge}, center_return_address=#{centerReturnAddress}, center_return_phone=#{centerReturnPhone} WHERE center_return_code=#{centerReturnCode};
